I will no longer purchase turmeric from Natures nutrition because the quality of the product has declined.  I have included a photo.. see for yourself.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: Let me begin with that I have a degree in biology and I also took a lot of courses in college about nutrition, biology of weight loss and obesity, and etc. One of the topics we had was about turmeric (curcumin). The benefits were enormous. We went over a few studies which showed that it is a natural fat blocker which can help with weight loss by decreasing inflammation in the body. Recently I started to research the best affordable "curcumin product" on the market since I was diagnosed with sacroiliitis. It doesn't really matter what brand you buy, but it is important to look at the ingredients and the amount of the product. So I am very pleased with the ingredients and the amount of the curcumin (keep in mind you can buy turmeric for $2, one tablespoon of turmeric contains about 140 mg of curcumin, but I hate the powder). I haven't finished the bottle yet, but I am feeling less inflammation and pain. BUT I'm also following a strict eating which means I eliminate all pro-inflammatory foods such as bread, flour, sweets, sugars and etc.So far so good. Keep everybody posted.

column4: I ordered this supplement due to its benefits with helping with inflammation.  Turmeric is known as an all natural anti inflammatory supplement and I have noticed its benefits while taking with minor aches and pains. I lift weights regularly and develop some pain at times and I have worked this supplement into my daily routine and noticed the difference. I ordered this supplement due to the addition of BioPerine which is supposed to help your blood absord the turmeric more effectively. The only draw back from these pills are you occasionally still get the turmeric taste which could be unpleasant. The pills are easy to take and I would recommend this product. column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: This is a good product.  It contains the requisite black pepper derivative which is essential for curcumin absorption.  The trick is to take the pills with something that contains fat, for curcumin is soluble in fat and not in water.  For instance, I drink a cup of morning tea with a lot of cream in it and swallow the curcumin as I enjoy this creamy cuppa.  That done, and if taken faithfully, you should begin to feel the beginnings of relief from inflammatory processes in your body in about 2 weeks.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: So sad to give a bad review. Have previously been using the Amazon Elements Tumeric and decided to try an alternative brand to save money. Unfortunatley the labeling on this is very misleading as it states 1950mg yet on closer inspection contains only 150mg of Curcuminoids for every 3 capsules. Years of ibuprofen use or rather abuse has resulted in my inability to use NSAIDs. I now rely on tumeric for aches & pains, tension headaches and so on. My understanding is that 500mg to 1000mg of Cucuminoids is required for anti-inflamatiry effect. Curcuminoids, the active ingredient only comprise a small part of turmeric and an even smaller part of this supplment. Basically one would have to take 10+ capsules to achieve any anti-inflamatory benefits and thus I am not only missing the cost savings but having to choke down a handful of pills.  Seriously dissapointed!

column4: I originally purchased this product for my wife who is experiencing some sort of muscle pain waking up in the morning, and also for myself for my left shoulder pain that's been there for so long. My doctor had prescribe all possible drugs to fix it, but all of them just worked temporarily, and the pain will come back within two to four weeks. I quit going to the doctor because nothing basically works to cure the pain. I have heard and even read about Turmeric in the past but paid no attention to it. I thought this is just another marketing hype. Well, it proved me wrong. To date, which is exactly one week of taking the Turmeric, I can honestly say that 99% of the pain is gone! Even my wife have noticed huge improvement waking up in the morning after just two days of taking it. Now, I am a firm believer that this product just works and, the best part is, that there is no side effect! It's that simple. I recommend this product and will definitely buy again.

column4: I have osteoarthritis in my right knee and I will eventually require surgery (bone on bone). My knee is often sore, stiff and painful. The stiffness is minimal and the pain gets dicey with a lot of walking about at work but I have not had to take my Ibuprofen 800mg in about 2 weeks now. Give it a try. It has really made a difference in how I feel. Love it.

column4: I can not say enough good things about this turmeric.  I suffer from bulging disks in my neck and lower back.  I won't take any of the pain medication my doctor keeps trying to push on me so I just suffer with the pain.  A friend of mine started taking turmeric for her pain and highly recommended it to me.  The day I received my order I took one then again later that evening.  A few short hours later my pain started to go away.  This is the best I've felt in several years.  I still have some minor pain but I can live with it.  I am now functional again, that's the important thing.  My niece also suffers from bad back pain.  I will be buying her a bottle as well.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I started using turmeric about three years ago when I was trying to find alternatives to taking daily over the counter pain relievers.  My Doctor told me I had to stop taking so many or I would end up with liver damage.  So I read that turmeric with bioprene works well for inflammation and joint pain.  I’ve tried several brands, some cheaper, some more expensive.  Some did nothing at all for me; while others may have worked well, but were either too expensive for me or I would have acid reflux episodes from the bioprene.  I settled on one brand for awhile when I went to reorder it, it was unavailable.  After searching for another brand that I thought that would work for me I tried this brand.  It was just as good if not better than what I was using at half the cost!!! I take turmeric for everyday aches and pains.  I also have bulging disks in my lower back and have hip pain from a car accident.  When I take turmeric I am able to go about my normal day without much pain (it doesn’t completely take my back pain away, but I am able to function).  My hip doesn’t hurt like it normally does.  I can tell when I haven’t taken my turmeric.  I wake up and my whole body hurts!!! I would highly recommended taking this brand as it seems to me to be just as good as the higher end ones that are sold and at half the price.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I am a 51 year old woman with a few aches and pains. I started taking Curcumin & BioPerene for several reasons. Studies have shown that it's effective for stress. I've put on some stress weight in the past year or so. After reading all the potential benefits of this product, (Treats Alzheimer's, fights cancer, helps anxiety and depression, can mimic estrogen, etc. etc. etc.  I thought it would be awesome if it would work well for even part of the stuff that the studies claim it helps. So I took it for 15 days and by about the  middle of the second week I realized I felt better. Less stressed, more motivated...then I waited too long to order and I ran out. o_O After about 2 days my hip and my shoulder and my ankles and all those other aches and pains that I had forgotten about (...because they didn't hurt!!)  were back! I bought two big old bottles of this stuff and (unless some unforseen side effects occur) I won't let myself run out again! I don't take any other supplements or meds.HOWEVER...I had my 72 year old mom try these. She doesn't take any other meds except ibuprofen (I know..right? She's spry for her age!) for her arthritis. She has only taken them for a week and she says she is cranky (...er than usual...lol) and is tired all the time. Also she is (are you ready) sleeping too soundly :-D and having weird dreams that she can't remember. I didn't realize that curcumin is a blood thinner (like many other herbs and spices) and it can cause low blood sugar and increase problems like GERD. Actually I could only find a very VERY few side effects and they were listed only as a result of taking large doses. Mom said she still takes 2 ibuprofen a day (which I didn't know.) and since that is also a blood thinner I wonder if that might not be why she is having issues? In any case, she has stopped taking them.SO... that is two sides of the story. I am thrilled to death with my results, mom...not so much.I'm going to have my brother try them too and I will post his results.  Hope this helps!

column4: Been looking for a curcumin supplement, and this one looked great. Then I did some research and dug up some ugly facts:1) SilverOnyx's main business is selling generic Chinese goods from AliExpress - water bottles and pressure cookers. Ok, no problem.2) Nature's Nutrition is not a "real" supplement company - it's a label that SilverOnyx slaps on its products.3) SilverOnyx said they test their curcumin for lead, but became evasive when asked to back this up with documentation.Yikes. My guess is that SilverOnyx imports a pre-made product from AliExpress and slaps a nice label on it. Ok, fine, but there's a huge problem with turmeric and lead contamination (google it). I would recommend spending a bit more on a product from an actual supplement company!

column4: The instructions on the bottle say to take one capsule three times per day. I thought that was a bit much so I only did one in the morning and one at night. Let me tell you, I’m so glad I didn’t do the third, because taking just the two had me HURTING. I woke up out of a dead sleep at 1am with the worst stomach pain I have ever experienced. I have bowel problems occasionally so I’m no stranger to the “bubble guts” and cramping, but let me tell you, I thought I was being eviscerated. After spending some time praying for a quicker death from the toilet, I felt better and was able to get back to sleep. These supplements were the only change I had made to medications, diet, and lifestyle. So I took a couple days off to recover and then started taking just one capsule per day in the morning. I have not had any issues since. Usually I wait to write a review until I’ve used the product for a while, but I really wanted to get this warning out so no one makes the same mistake I did. I’m giving this product only two stars because the instructions do not line up with the recommended daily dosing that I’ve seen.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I wanted to wait three months before I wrote a review. 58 years old(female) I can honestly say this stuff works for inflammation. My joint pain while walking is no longer an issue. My shoulder pain is almost totally gone !!! Years of pain with it - PT etc. didn't work. A real surprise was after first month I noticed one day that my hot flashes were gone ! OMGosh - I wasn't expecting this and I wish I had know this 8 years ago ! 3rd month Hot Flashes still gone - and I feel cold again - when I should (like the old days). And I saved this for last. Memory ! ! ! !  I was beginning to have that foggy feeling and then when things started showing up where they don't belong (creamer in the cupboard!) was getting a little worried. Having to really work at finding where I filed things at work(electronically) or remembering if I had done something or not.  Well this stuff is just amazing. I can say that I no longer have any of these issues !!!!!  For example - I go upstairs to my bedroom to get my kindle - I see that the bed needs to be made - I make the bed - then I grab my kindle - go into the bathroom with it to brush my teeth(leave it on the sink) - go back to bedroom water the plant. Before I would have just gone back downstairs - now I say (to myself) go get the kindle from the bathroom ! And I do ! ! !  I know it sounds silly but in other words I am back to my old self.  The kind of things that were slipping were what I call things you do on 'auto-pilot'. Another example is cooking dinner. You are doing a bunch of things at once.  You kind of set the table without thinking to much about it. Then a few minutes later - I get out silverware and take it to the table to see that it was already there. Another example is you're in the shower and you kind of wash on autopilot. I also shave my legs. Well I would stop and say did I already shave that leg? Then I would have to feel it to see if I had shaved it! Scary. But son of a gun - no more - I honestly feel like a 20 year younger version of myself. No fogginess. No hot flashes. good joints and really helps with your memory and mood :) . My husband is also experiencing good results. He was not having hot flashes but rather men issues - not any more !  My unprofessional opinion is that inflammation affects many many aspects of our health and I will never be without this stuff. We both take 3 a day(recommended dose) - am/noon and PM. I recommend you give it 3 months to see if it works for you.  FYI - I don't see any negative side effects either

column4: I recently started taking this product after reading an article in which an MD stated they used it for various problems.  My wife has been using it for about a year with no problem.However, about a week after I started taking the recommended daily dose, I began to get nose bleeds,  These continued for several days during which I went to a clinic for nasal cauterization & eventually to a hospital ER where a latex balloon was inserted in my nose & inflated.  Had to keep it in for two days.  Very uncomfortable.  Medical personnel kept asking if I was on blood thinners & I told them no, only low dose aspirin which I stopped taking the first night I had a bad bleed.  On the 2nd day I had the balloon in my nose I remembered I had not told the medics about taking this product as I had just started it.  I then researched it further & came across a website where people had reported bad nose bleeds when they used this type supplement.  I will add further that I was using a cold med with acetaminophen for a few days due to a bad head & chest cold.  Long story short.  This supplement has a blood thinning action and in my case I believe taking it, the cold medicine & low dose aspirin all ganged up to create a problem  So just beware that this supplement has a blood thinning effect.

column4: The manufacturer seems to be trying to get you to believe that one serving of this supplement (3 capsules) contains 1950 mg of a substance that has a potency of 95% curcuminoids. The banner next to the picture of the bottle says "Highest Potency 95% Curcuminoids," and another panel proclaims "Standardized to 95% curcuminoids."However, if you read the Supplement Facts you will find the truth there; 1800 mg of each serving is just plain old turmeric. Only 150 mg has a potency of 95% curcuminoids.It's misleading to say that this supplement is of highest potency. That's true of only 7.6% of what goes into these capsules. There are other supplements available here that have three times as much curcuminoids.

column4: My teenage son complains of his knees hurting so I thought we would try this.  After it arrived I decided to try it too as I have some neck pain.  Especially in the mornings and I often take a prescription strength ibuprofen for it.  We have only been taking this for 5 days so far, but we both think it is helping.  I got the smallest bottle so came back on here to order another one. At 6 tablets per day for the both of us it won’t last long. I hope it continues to help us.Update: a couple months later and I am faithfully taking 3 of these every single day. If I forget to take them, my neck pain reminds me to take them. Prior to taking this supplement, I had been taking 800 mg of ibuprofen as needed (I used it as sparingly as I could to control the pain).  Without the ibuprofen, I often had sleepless nights because the pain was so bad. The pain had been going on for a few years. If I take 3 of these each day, I have no pains. I recommend these to anyone I hear complaining of pain. As for my son, he is a teenager and I set them out for him but often he doesn’t take them. So I’m unable to say whether these have helped him any.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: This product is Amazing. I was diagnosed with Gastritis (GERD), along with duodenitis, and esophagitis 6 years ago. Since then, I've have major struggles with weight (gaining weight, and struggling to lose weight). My stomach became irritated by everything. Things that shouldn't bother me, started to bother me, things that a week ago didn't bother my stomach, started to bother me, my body would just reject anything and I would have major issues severely bloating, and my stomach being overheated. No matter how healthy I ate, and no matter what I cut out my diet, I would keep on weight, and not lose it, and I would have issues with my stomach. I have been struggling with this for years.I came across a video by ThickChickVlogs where she recommended people on her channel to try the product out for weight loss and if you had acid reflux. I tried the product along with apple cider vinegar, and the weight I had been struggling to keep off for years, and for the last 5 months I had struggled to get it off, instantly started falling off. In 4 days I had loss 7 pounds. In addition to that, my stomach stopped being so irritated. Since I was diagnosed with gastritis, going to sleep was always the worst part of my day. Literally ever day when I would wake up, my stomach would hurt, and I would be severely bloated, no matter what I did. However after 6 years, I woke up in the morning without my stomach hurting and being bloated.This product also allowed me to not get as irritated by foods that used to irritated me, like some spices, breads, and dairy products. I used to use Zantac, which has side effects if you use it too much, and now I'm happy to find a natural supplement that can help out with my stomach issues without those side effects. I would recommend when you try this product to open up the capsules and to drink it with apple cider vinegar for easy consumption, and for extra weight loss benefits.Using this and following a clean diet, I will keep as a part of my daily routine for my lifestyle. I am confident that with this product and a clean diet, I can manage my weight loss issues, and digestive issues.

column4: Upon my research of Turmeric I saw different recommendations and results. I did not start taking it until my ex-wife who is a nurse said it helped with pain. So I  started taking one pill daily with the rest of my vitamins and supplements.  I did not feel any less pain even after two weeks so I increased the dose. I started taking two pills in the morning with water as soon as I awoke. I work swing shift and sometimes I go back to bed in the morning so I wait to take my daily vitamins and supplements with my lunch.  I added one turmeric to those pills and I take one more at night before going to bed ( 4 daily). Before I knew it not only was the Gout pain gone but the pain from my arthritic knee was gone too!  But I am not writing because my pain is gone. I am writing because I told a co-worker about this. She told me a friend of hers was having pain from gout. I told her this story and she told her friend. It was probably about a week after I told her that she said her friends pain was gone.  The price is a little more then regular vitamins but it is a fraction of what pain meds cost!!! I am going to make sure I have plenty of Turmeric on hand. Thanks!!!

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: The title says "95% Curcuminoids 1950mg". What they mean is that their product contains 1950mg of TURMERIC, which is different thing from CURCUMIN, the active ingredient in turmeric. When they say "95%" they mean that their product includes a tiny amount of turmeric extract, and 95% of that extract is curcuminoids. There is strong evidence that curcuminoids have health benefits, but much less reason to believe turmeric does anything beneficial.The health benefits from curcumin come at dosages of around 1500mg/day, so you might think this "1950mg" supplement is a good dosage. But actually every serving of 3 capsules contains only 150mg (times 95%) of curcuminoids, so you would need to take OVER THIRTY CAPSULES PER DAY for a reasonable dose.

column4: I got this product because a powerlifting website I follow reviewed the use of turmeric for training, and mentioned its anti-inflammatory effects as good for recovery.  I was pleasantly surprised that one day after I started taking it my consistently gassy stomach improved and has remained non-gassy for two months now.  My shoulder pain (18 months and counting) disappeared, and I have reduced my bipolar meds and no longer need sleeping pills.  Live feels kinda Zen-like now.  Crazy but true.  So it worked for me and I will continue.  I imagine it worked as all my ailments are associated with inflammation to some degree or other.  Oh, and my powerlifting seems to have improved, I notice in particular reduced muscle soreness.  Also an inflammation-related issue.However, I gave some to my mother and she said they gave her nightmares and so she had to discontinue.My best advice?  We are all bio-chemical experiments of one.  Try it and if it works, continue.  If it doesn't, don't.  Not much downside and plenty of upside associated with this decision.

column4: It's hard these days, for a number of reasons, to get care and pain relief. Though I have had a previous back surgery and years of care at the same physician, I now have terrible insurance and a busy schedule making it very expensive and difficult to go through their protocol for a full evaluation (MRIs) and treatment (including multiple physical therapy sessions per week) now that I'm having daily pain in my back, neck, and all my major joints. So, like many Americans, I have chosen to try to treat myself. I take 2 capsules 3 times daily and have had a SERIOUS reduction in pain. I won't pretend to be pain free, but I can now do things such as: roll over easily in bed, get out of bed without needing to grab my headboard for assistance, and I'm not spending 2 hours each morning stooped because I can't stand up straight. Ibuprofen helps, but I've been lectured repeatedly at the doctor for taking so much of it, though they can't/won't recommend anything else that I can take. Now that my pain is lessened, it's easier to exercise, which is also key for me. Physical therapy is nice, but I can't pay $800 for 4 sessions a week indefinitely, so it just remains a distant dream!

column4: I have arthritis in my hip.  I had pain with every step a few months ago.  I tend to be skeptical of any medicine or herbal product, but I thought I'd try this.  It makes a HUGE difference for me!  I have taken it regularly for about 6 months.  I have tried backing off of my 3 times a day dosage, to see if it makes a difference, and it DOES.  A word of caution: Some research shows that curcumin inhibits iron absorption, and can make you anemic.  I became anemic after taking this for a couple of months.  Now, I try to make sure I'm getting plenty of iron in my diet, and it helps.  I also make sure that I take my curcumin and multivitamins at different times, to hopefully reduce the effect.  I rarely write reviews.  I like this product enough to endorse it.  I hope it works for you, too.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: This brand, Nature's Nutrition is awful. I bought NewRhythm twice and it was great both times.My 3rd order I tried this Nature's Nutrition brand, I got it b/c it was less expensive and had more bioperine (black pepper) in it and boy was that a mistake. It didn't do anything for me and it isn't organic. This product and New Rhythm had the same count and this one was like $5 bucks less, I guess you get what you pay for. The most upsetting was after I looked up the other ingredients in the Nature's Nutrition brand - Microcrystalline cellulose: which is a term for refined wood pulp and is used as a texturizer, an anti-caking agent, a fat substitute, an emulsifier, an extender, and a bulking agent in food production, and Silicon Dioxide: also known as silica - a white or colorless crystalline compound found naturally in sand, granite and many other types of rocks. Concrete and masonry products, the primary materials used in road construction, contain both silica sand and rock containing silica. Last ingredient is the vegetable capsule --- I should have done my homework.NewRhythm only has 1 other ingredient, which is Purified Water and Veggie Capsule. No wonder I was missing my NewRhythm Turmeric Curcumin!I'll be sticking with new rhythm from now on!! I honestly didn't think I would be able to tell a difference, boy was I wrong. Wish I could get a refund!!!Edit: I'm adding a star, taking it from 1star to 2stars, due to their prompt response to my enquiry/email and them refunding my order. I respect them for that and they do have amazing customer service! - Thanks.
column10: This brand, Nature's Nutrition is awful. I bought NewRhythm twice and it was great both times.My 3rd order I tried this Nature's Nutrition brand, I got it b/c it was less expensive and had more bioperine (black pepper) in it and boy was that a mistake. It didn't do anything for me and it isn't organic. This product and New Rhythm had the same count and this one was like $5 bucks less, I guess you get what you pay for. The most upsetting was after I looked up the other ingredients in the Nature's Nutrition brand - Microcrystalline cellulose: which is a term for refined wood pulp and is used as a texturizer, an anti-caking agent, a fat substitute, an emulsifier, an extender, and a bulking agent in food production, and Silicon Dioxide: also known as silica - a white or colorless crystalline compound found naturally in sand, granite and many other types of rocks. Concrete and masonry products, the primary materials used in road construction, contain both silica sand and rock containing silica. Last ingredient is the vegetable capsule --- I should have done my homework.NewRhythm only has 1 other ingredient, which is Purified Water and Veggie Capsule. No wonder I was missing my NewRhythm Turmeric Curcumin!I'll be sticking with new rhythm from now on!! I honestly didn't think I would be able to tell a difference, boy was I wrong. Wish I could get a refund!!!Edit: I'm adding a star, taking it from 1star to 2stars, due to their prompt response to my enquiry/email and them refunding my order. I respect them for that and they do have amazing customer service! - Thanks.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I purchased a VERY expensive Tumeric concentration from a health food store and was AMAZED at how quickly my arthritic pain went AWAY (GONE ...!!!) but the expense was 80 cents per pill and I can't afford that so ... I purchased this product from Amazon at 15 cents per pill (got the smallest bottle to try) ... the pain remains GONE, I can close my hands which I could not do before and I am happy with the cost per day ... I vary between 2 and 3 tablets depending on how "tight" my joints feel.  I am going to be VERY honest here ... My stiffness doesn't seem to be drastically improved so far (only on this for 10 days) but the pain subsided drastically within the first 2 days and seems to be gone ... I am HORRIBLE about taking pills regularly but I know that this stops the pain so I am very faithful this at least this supplement.  I am no longer taking Aleve 2 pills 2x per day with Tylenol mid day if the pain is extreme.  I don't know how well this will work in the winter but I am very willing to give it a go ... this is working better for me than Aleve so far.  I must also be honest and say that I have become a Tumeric "pusher" ... my boss at work told me she could not sleep at night because of arthritis pain so I gave her a 5 day supply to get her going and on day 3 she ordered more from Amazon.  Is this the best combination??? I really don't know but it is working for me so at least for now I am a BELIEVER ...

column4: Good product. Good price. I have read about the many benefits of turmeric/curcumin and began taking it. I prepare a tonic drink in 16 ounces of water every morning consisting of 3 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp apple cider vinegar, 2 tsp bee pollen, 1 tbsp cherry concentrate and a dash of ginger, cinnamon, and 1 capsule of this turmeric which I break open and add to the drink. I then add some stevia and/or honey, foam it up in a drink mixer and divide in two glasses. I call it our daily flu shot. Since I began taking this over 18 months ago neither my wife nor I have had a cold or the flu. Knock on wood.
column10: Good product. Good price. I have read about the many benefits of turmeric/curcumin and began taking it. I prepare a tonic drink in 16 ounces of water every morning consisting of 3 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp apple cider vinegar, 2 tsp bee pollen, 1 tbsp cherry concentrate and a dash of ginger, cinnamon, and 1 capsule of this turmeric which I break open and add to the drink. I then add some stevia and/or honey, foam it up in a drink mixer and divide in two glasses. I call it our daily flu shot. Since I began taking this over 18 months ago neither my wife nor I have had a cold or the flu. Knock on wood.

column4: I ordered this last month after a friend told me that it's really helped her Fibromyalgia. I initially bought the Spring Valley brand of these 500 mg  Tumeric capsules with Ginger at my local Wal-Mart, but I found these 1950 mg capsules with black pepper extract here and ordered them to save money. But a bargain is not a bargain if it doesn't work, and these didn't work for me at all.  Maybe they'd been on the shelf too long. Taking 1 capsule of 500 mg Tumeric with ginger 4 times daily is managing my pain better than anything else I've tried in 15 years. But this brand made no difference whatsoever.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: After reading positive reviews as to the health benefits of Turmeric Curcumin, I elected to purchase this particular product.  It is well packaged, arrived quickly and from all appearances seems to be a very high quality product.  However after taking this for approximately three weeks, I began noticing significant bruising on my hands and forearms.  As a male at age 67 in excellent health and shape, I had in the past experienced minor bruising (Ecchymosis) as a result of moderate trauma to those areas.  As noted, blood vessels become more fragile with age and certain supplements and medications may also play a major role in ruptured blood vessels resulting in skin discoloration.Regrettably, the use of this product for approximately three weeks suddenly caused skin discoloration like I have never experienced and without any identified trauma.  After discontinuing the use of the product, my skin returned to normal and bruising stopped.  I attempted to return the product however it had passed the cutoff date for such a return.  This issue may only be applicable to me but I would caution those who have experienced skin discoloration to check with their physician before beginning using this or other Turmeric supplements.
column10: After reading positive reviews as to the health benefits of Turmeric Curcumin, I elected to purchase this particular product.  It is well packaged, arrived quickly and from all appearances seems to be a very high quality product.  However after taking this for approximately three weeks, I began noticing significant bruising on my hands and forearms.  As a male at age 67 in excellent health and shape, I had in the past experienced minor bruising (Ecchymosis) as a result of moderate trauma to those areas.  As noted, blood vessels become more fragile with age and certain supplements and medications may also play a major role in ruptured blood vessels resulting in skin discoloration.Regrettably, the use of this product for approximately three weeks suddenly caused skin discoloration like I have never experienced and without any identified trauma.  After discontinuing the use of the product, my skin returned to normal and bruising stopped.  I attempted to return the product however it had passed the cutoff date for such a return.  This issue may only be applicable to me but I would caution those who have experienced skin discoloration to check with their physician before beginning using this or other Turmeric supplements.

column4: I have been taking the Tumeric Curcumin with Pepper for three weeks now. The bursitis in my hips and shoulder pain has not been as bad as they were. I have a sit-down job and when I used to get up after sitting a while I could barely stand because of the pain in my hips. I don't seem to have that problem quite as badly now. I am able to stand up immediately and walk without difficulty. The Tumeric Curcumin helps somewhat when I sleep but I still cannot sleep on my side because of the bursitis pain but it does help me when I stand and walk. My shoulder pain has almost diminished. I only feel the pain in my shoulders now when I lie on my side.

column4: Just let me say that I order from Amazon on a daily basis, but I never write reviews. However, I feel compelled to write this review because I feel like it will help someone. My neck and back were both broken due to a car accident. I was prescribed pain pills by my pain management physician & I was eating those pills like m&m's, but they barely touched my pain. I decided that I needed to do something different because I didnt want to end up addicted to pain meds. To make a long story short..I found these Turmeric supplements here on AmAZON and decided to give them a try & Oh my goodness! Im so thankful that I did. Within a few days I noticed a huge difference in my level of pain, the pain was tolerable and within two more dAys, the pain was gone! I couldn't believe it. I kept taking them as directed and I havent had anymore crippling pain. I'm telling everyone to buy these pills because they are heaven sent.

column4: I started using turmeric about a year ago when I was having a lot of joint pain, after hearing from several people that this was suppose to help. I was skeptical, to say the least. After a lot of reading, I settled on a brand from Walmart that was doing the trick. The key is the BioPerine, for absorption, if you don't have enough in your supplement, it won't absorb and you might not get the full benefits.Flash forward a few months and my husband wants to add my turmeric to the Amazon auto service (his goals in life are to avoid Walmart as much as possible). So, he finds a turmeric supplement and adds it for me (not this one). I noticed the difference right away (not in the good way, all the aches and pains had returned) and told him the absorption was off, so he went looking and found this gem. As soon as I switched to this pill, with the 15mg of BioPerine, I was back to feeling good.Of note: when I first started taking turmeric supplements I was suffering from massive pain in both knees, joint pain in my hips, and a burning pain in my right shoulder. I also had a lot of lower back pain. I was taking 3 different pain pills to manage the pain. I am 46.  Within 3 days of starting turmeric, the shoulder pain was completely gone. I was stunned. The pain and heat in both my knees is gone. My lower back pain is managed (along with the help of a great massage therapist). I can tell in the evenings when it's time to take my pills because I'll start to feel a little stiffness in my hips returning. I move better in the mornings since taking turmeric. I now only have take one of the pain pills for nerve pain in my legs, as needed. That's what turmeric has done for me.

column4: Turmeric is an excellent for treating many ailments. I myself use it for pain from early onset arthritis in my knees. I would definitely recommend it's use. I also give it to my dogs! Here are some benefits: "Turmeric is a spice that comes from the turmeric plant. It is commonly used in Asian food. You probably know turmeric as the main spice in curry. It has a warm, bitter taste and is frequently used to flavor or color curry powders, mustards, butters, and cheeses. But the root of turmeric is also used widely to make medicine. It contains a yellow-colored chemical called curcumin, which is often used to color foods and cosmetics.Turmeric is used for arthritis, heartburn (dyspepsia), joint pain, stomach pain, Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, bypass surgery, hemorrhage, diarrhea, intestinal gas, stomach bloating, loss of appetite, jaundice, liver problems, Helicobacter pylori (H. pylori) infection, stomach ulcers, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), gallbladder disorders, high cholesterol, a skin condition called lichen planus, skin inflammation from radiation treatment, and fatigue.It is also used for headaches, bronchitis, colds, lung infections, fibromyalgia, leprosy, fever, menstrual problems, itchy skin, recovery after surgery, and cancers. Other uses include depression, Alzheimer's disease, swelling in the middle layer of the eye (anterior uveitis), diabetes, water retention, worms, an autoimmune disease called systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), tuberculosis, urinary bladder inflammation, and kidney problems.Some people apply turmeric to the skin for pain, ringworm, sprains and swellings, bruising, leech bites, eye infections, acne, inflammatory skin conditions and skin sores, soreness inside of the mouth, infected wounds, and gum disease."

column4: After having spent several hours researching and evaluating nutritional literature and now, my own experience, I can wholeheartedly support and recommend Nature's Nutrition Turmeric Curcumin with Black Pepper supplement.First of all a little background, I was injured significantly during a car accident almost 5 years ago.  During this accident I broke both heels, a number of ribs, my sternum, my right knee, my right ankle and sustained some internal injuries.  Even though, these injuries left me with some mobility problems (right leg primarily, but several whole body issues), I was determined to minimize them.  I have tried many ways, but what has been most effective (it's still working!) is when I began taking 3 capsules each day of Turmeric Curcumin with black pepper (as directed by the bottle).  One of the claims of taking this supplement is how it reduces inflammation, THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT IT HAS DONE!  I have tried other brands, BUT, Nature's Nutrition brand is the highest potency and best value I have found!  Buy it, it works for me!

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I have Fibromyalgia and have periodic 'flare-ups' where the pain is quite intense and disabling. I recently went to a new rheumatologist because my inflammatory markers were up off the charts. I took this as directed for a couple of months and although I seemed to be gradually getting some relief, I wasn't sure it was the Turmeric, until I ran out. After about a week, the pain and inflammation returned, so I quickly ordered another bottle. I have a lot less pain and inflammation when I take this product, so I would recommend that anyone who has problems with chronic pain and inflammation give it a try!

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I have a mixed connective tissue disease, and this is first time in years I have felt human again.  Start the first week building yourself up to them making sure they don’t upset your stomach ( bc everyone is different) and I do go to the bathroom more frequently now ( bonus) and I added a quality  probiotic as well.  I breathe better, sleep better and feel like a whole new person.  I was the only person I know that didn’t get the flu and I took care of three children and husband that did have it.  I have lived in slow motion on and off bc of my illness for almost 7 years and this is the first time I feel complete.  I tell everyone I meet about these pills and I’ve put my whole family on them.  Even my pharmacist at my drive through window bc her back hurts! I literally pulled my phone out and she wrote everything down.  If you do any kind of research at all you will see what turmeric really does.  See for you self. (A lot of major university hospitals are doing case studies on the turmeric and cancer and it’s proving to be helpful. ) My joint pain has taken more time to lessen and headaches have even eased and I have been on topomax for migraines for some time but still always had to take headache powders at least four days a week bc of sinus headaches.  Now that is done as well.  I’m done with month two of these, so when I put this time frame into perspective, my family has seen a total 180 in a couple of months bc I religiously take three pills a day.  I had given up on help from doctors and my cabinet full of pills that made me vomit at least twice a day and remained constipated or having diarrhea and being nearly carried to bed some nights, plus high blood pressure and on an antidepressant bc who wouldn’t be sad.  Now I’ve,  with the go ahead from doc, come off the blood pressure pill (110/70) ,loss of 14 lbs, energy and feeling like a human, cutting down the dosage to come off antidepressants, the only pills I’ll be on will be herbal.  Thank you to this company, I would be your spokes woman for the rest of my life!! Hahaha

column4: Amazing product. Results virtually immediate. I'm just generally creaky. Everything's a little sore. Back, fingers, feet, and joints generally. It's just age. These arrived yesterday. I took my first dose with lunch. In a short time I noticed I wasn't a sore as usual. Today's day two, and I feel even better. I might say I'm actually beginning to feel loose. That's amazing. I've never tried this type of supplement before, but if this keeps up I'll be taking this everyday forever.3-WEEK UPDATE: Taking this every morning with or without food. Doesn't give me indigestion. Having the same reaction as written above everyday - no diminished effect. One morning I accidentally took 4, and noticed a marked difference in the effects of 3 and 4. So now I take 3 or 4 depending on how I feel that day. Twice this month I've worked in the yard rather hard. Trimming hedges, digging holes, etc. Gets to my lower back. Usually I take an over-the-counter med (aspirin or Tylenol) before bed on work-in-the-yard days to ease the tightness/pain in my back while I sleep. For these two work days though I took this turmeric instead. Worked perfectly. Just like in the morning. I didn't have to take anything else. I actually think they did a better job than pain medication. Slept really well. I continue to be amazed.I've already ordered another bottle so I don't miss a day:)

column4: I live in pain - if I'm not in pain management, I'm at Physical Therapy - or most times I'm hunched over waiting for prescription drugs to half-work. Upon my second day of taking this product it was like God himself laid his hands on my neck and back, the relief of tension and muscle pain can be described as nothing short of miraculous. I take two at a time, and as my pain gets worse at night I inch towards a third; besides minor stomach irritation I have no side effects to report. I cringe each time I took a strong prescription drug (and I have some strong stuff) thinking this is going to be the pill that gets me hooked...I'm happy to report I'm cringing a whole lot less these days. Amazon takes everything back, you've got nothing to loose, and if you're anything like me - you've got some freedom to gain.

column4: I had no idea how powerful this supplement was going to be. I wanted a way to reduce inflammation throughout my entire system. Feel free to google but when you detox too quickly, your cells release all those toxins in your bloodstream at the same time, which overwhelms your system. It's also known as a "die off" reaction called "the herx".  It is NOT FUN and it made me stop taking the capsules. It took a week for the herx to go away (it was a miserable week). After that I slowly reintroduced these magical capsules in my life. All is well now!I had an event last weekend where I ate chocolate cake and pie...normally this would cause a flare up. But, with the curcumin in my system, nothing happened! My skin is looking great again.

column4: I was skeptical, but am convinced. A friend recommended this product and they were right. Part of the pain is due to the mattress, but most is wear and tear/overuse/misuse.After taking this for a week or so I realized I could get out of bed with minimal pain. column4: I’ve been using this brand of turmeric curcumin for a year, and I’ve discovered that following the recommended daily dosage works well. I’m 50 years old, and I have osteoarthritis that mainly affects my knees and ankles.When I first began taking turmeric curcumin, I took one capsule. Why not, right? I could stretch 120 capsules out over four months. But I didn’t notice any benefit.So about six months ago, I upped my daily dosage to two capsules. I began to experience less pain, especially when walking upstairs. I still didn’t entirely believe the capsules were the reason until I began taking the recommended dosage earlier this year, which is three capsules daily.Wow, what a difference! The most noticeable benefit happens first thing upon waking. No longer do I stagger across the bedroom, trying to get my poor ankles acclimated to moving again. I also don't need to lean against a wall to prep my knees to move again after sitting on a couch for a couple of hours. No, there’s none of that anymore. I’m a long way removed from being a spry youngster who can hop out of bed without a concern, but I can walk normally all the time now, and I credit turmeric curcumin for much of my progress.

column4: From Jeanne: Three years ago I was diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis and prescribed hydroxychloroquine (Plaquenil). Within a few months I was experiencing frightening and debilitating side effects, including sudden and rapid drops in blood pressure, the feeling of losing conscientious, light-headedness, stomach pain and elevated liver enzymes. My rheumatologist and PCP took me off the medications (after I made the connection) and with my rheumatologist's approval I started taking Turmeric Curcumin (my doctor said it must have a minimum of 100mg turmeric and a minimum of 10 mg of black pepper extract). After taking no prescription drug and only Turmeric Curcumin since 2017, my lab tests have been consistently better each time and I have felt better; and six months ago my doctor told me that my lab tests show that I am now in remission. I have since switched to Turmeric Curcumin with Ginger, as ginger also reduces inflammation, which is the culprit in arthritis. I may switch back to the regular Turmeric Curcumin if I find the combination is too hard on my stomach. Tip: Take Turmeric Curcumin with food to protect your stomach.

column4: I stated taking this supplement due to joint pain (called arthralgias) that women who have been treated for breast cancer sometimes experience with medications known as aromatase inhibitors. Great stuff and who wouldn't want to go natural when treating pain?

column4: I don't want to get my hopes up as I've been down this road before, but I am having really good results from this. I have several medical issues. I started taking turmeric because my rheumatologist recommended it. I have inflammation in my body that they can't figure out. At the the time I saw her I had horrible eczema on my hands. And my sed rate had been slightly elevated every time I got my blood done (every 3 months). So I thought, why not. Well, it's been 2-3 months since I started and wow. My eczema is practically gone. But the biggest difference it has made was something unrelated to the original recommendation. It has almost fixed my menstruation cycle. After having my son 7 years ago my period has been out of wake. I started getting it every 21 days. I literally only had about 5 good days every 3 weeks. My period was extremely heavy. My mood was horrible week before. I had rage and was so emotional over the littlest things. I also had physical symptoms that at times were debilitating. I'd get flu like symptoms prior. Extreme fatigue, or sometimes insomnia. I was just completely out of whack. No doctors could seem to help me.So now it's been 2-3 months since starting and oh my goodness have things changed. My period came 34 days later! It was way less heavy. My moods have been leveling out and I feel more in control. And the real kicker is the increased sex drive I'm having! I suppose feeling better physically and mentally could be the reason. But I've been reading about turmeric and it's another added bonus of its goodness.

column2: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine 95% Curcuminoids 1950mg with Black Pepper for Best Absorption, Made in USA, Natural Immune Support, Turmeric Supplement Pills by Natures Nutrition - 120 Capsules
column4: I was SUPER skeptical about this product working.  But anyone that knows what it is like to have pain everyday for months on end knows that you get to a point where you are willing to try almost anything.  About 4 months ago I went from someone who walked everywhere, miles and miles every day, and loved it, to someone who couldn't walk a block without sciatic pain dropping me to my knees at time.  I stopped taking public transit to work (back when we all actually left the house to go to work) and had to start driving because I was unable to walk the 2 miles to and from the train everyday anymore.  I stopped going hiking on weekends, heck I couldn't anything I loved to do anymore, even trips to the grocery store were painful.  I started seeing a chiropractor and went about 8 times with no change, I had not given up on that but then then we all were put on virus lock down.  I started reading about sciatic pain and something that came up over and over was the term inflammation.  II could change my diet to help and I have started to do that, but that can take a lot of time to have an effect and in the meantime I was unable to actually exercise which would have helped (catch 22).  SO I started taking this 3 times a day and I kid you not, one week later I went for a Hike!  Not my normal 7-10 miles but a still a honest to goodness 2 miles in the woods hike without a hint of pain.  I almost didn't believe it, I spent most of the hike waiting for that sharp paint to shoot down my leg and take me out..but no pain.  I have continued to take this for the last three weeks and still no more pain.  And I did a longer hike last weekend!  The great thing is I am not able to move again which helps with my condition overall.  Some may say it was a coincidence but I refuse to believe it, nothing in my life changed other than I started taking this and now I am almost totally pain free.
